meanings.definition: To make (an action or process) legal or permissible.
meanings.sent1: The government is legalizing the use of seat belts for safety.
meanings.sent2: The city council is considering legalizing street food vendors.
meanings.sent3: Legalizing lemonade stands could lead to a surge in young entrepreneurs.
meanings.sent4: She felt like legalizing her daily walks brought a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent5: Legalizing the use of helmets while biking can prevent head injuries.

meanings.definition: To give legal validity or sanction to.
meanings.sent1: The judge is legalizing the contract between the two parties.
meanings.sent2: The new law will legalize same-sex marriage in the country.
meanings.sent3: Legalizing the parking tickets made the city seem more organized.
meanings.sent4: Her signature legalizes the document and makes it official.
meanings.sent5: Legalizing the sale of alcohol requires strict regulations to ensure safety.
